blogPost.excerpt: Surprise your customers with invoices, newsletters and pretty much any URL or HTML template converted into high-quality PDFs without the hassle and costs of developing your own solution. Scalable
blogPost.body: Surprise your customers with invoices, newsletters and pretty much any URL or HTML template converted into high-quality PDFs without the hassle and costs of developing your own solution. Scalable
blogPost.title: Pdfbix - Scalable REST API to generate PDF
blogPost.author: Dheeraj Bhardwaj

localize.description: 让您的客户惊喜的是，您可以将发票、新闻邮件和几乎所有的URL或HTML模板转换为高质量的PDF文件，而无需开发自己的解决方案的麻烦和成本。可扩展
讓您的客戶驚喜的是，您可以將發票、新聞郵件和幾乎所有的URL或HTML模板轉換爲高質量的PDF文件，而無需開發自己的解決方案的麻煩和成本。可擴展

previous.excerpt: Career Emails is a collection of great email templates that cover a number of networking situations, including how to ask an industry leader for advice, cold email alumni, follow up with someone, write effective LinkedIn connection request notes, and more!
previous.title: Networking Emails - 100+ proven email templates to help your career in 2021

localize.description: 职场邮件》是一套优秀的邮件模板，涵盖了多种人脉关系的情况，包括如何向行业领导请教、给校友发冷邮件、与人跟进、写有效的LinkedIn连接请求说明等。
localize.tagline: 100+成熟的邮件模板，为你的2021年事业发展助力

localize.description: 職場郵件》是一套優秀的郵件模板，涵蓋了多種人脈關係的情況，包括如何向行業領導請教、給校友發冷郵件、與人跟進、寫有效的LinkedIn連接請求說明等。
localize.tagline: 100+成熟的郵件模板，爲你的2021年事業發展助力

next.excerpt: A complete set of 4350 relaxed and comfortable icons. Plumpy style icons are modern with a bit of retro flair featuring heavily-rounded corners and a two-tone color style. • Modern two-tone colors • Friendly rounded styling • Scales and recolors well
next.title: Plumpy Icons - 4350 modern and friendly duotone icons by Icons8

localize.description: 一套完整的4350个轻松舒适的图标。Plumpy风格的图标是现代与一点复古的风格，具有重圆角和双色风格。- 现代的双色调颜色 - 友好的圆角造型 - 良好的缩放和重新着色能力。
localize.tagline: 4350个现代和友好的双色调图标由Icons8提供。

localize.description: 一套完整的4350個輕鬆舒適的圖標。Plumpy風格的圖標是現代與一點復古的風格，具有重圓角和雙色風格。- 現代的雙色調顏色 - 友好的圓角造型 - 良好的縮放和重新着色能力。
localize.tagline: 4350個現代和友好的雙色調圖標由Icons8提供。
